import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useCartContext } from '../../context/CartContext' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faTrashAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import './cart.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import CartForm from './CartForm'; const Cart = () => { const {clearCart, cart, removeItem} = useCartContext() let total = 0; const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState) const inputs = [ {type: 'text', placeholder:"ing nombr", name:"nombre", value: formData.nombre}, {type: 'text', placeholder:"ing te", name:"tel", value: formData.tel}, {type: 'email', placeholder:"ing email", name:"email", value: formData.email}, {type: 'email', placeholder:"confirme el mai", name:"email2", value: formData.email2} ] return ( <>{cart.length === 0 &&

No hay nada en tu carrito

} {cart.length > 0 &&
{cart.map(element => )}
# Nombre Cantidad Precio Total por unidad
{element.item.name} {element.qty} {element.item.price} {element.item.price*element.qty}
{cart.map(element => { return total = element.item.price * element.qty + total} )}

} ) } export default Cart const initialState = { nombre: '', email:'', tel:'' }
